Schedule rebuilding of the text geometry.
Schedule updating of the material used by the text object.
Function to be used to force recomputing of character padding when Shader / Material properties have been changed via script.

section.title: ForceMeshUpdate()[2/2]

para.para: Function to force regeneration of the mesh before its normal process time. This is useful when changes to the text object properties need to be applied immediately.

entry.para: If set to true, the text object will be regenerated regardless of is active state.
